minvakt.controller

Class ShiftController

  • java.lang.Object
    • minvakt.controller.ShiftController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/shifts")
public class ShiftController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for interacting directly with the shifts and the assigned shifts in the database

    • Constructor Summary

      Autowired by Spring to gain access to all the specified controllers and repos

      • getShifts

        @GetMapping
public java.lang.Iterable<?> getShifts(@RequestParam(defaultValue="false")
                                                    boolean detailed)
        Gets all the shifts in the database
        Parameters:
        detailed - if you want detailed shift (extra info)
        Returns:
        an iterable with Shift or DetailedShift

      • getShiftsBetween

        @GetMapping(value="/limited")
public java.lang.Iterable<?> getShiftsBetween(@RequestParam(value="from") @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE)
                                                                             java.time.LocalDate from,
                                                                             @RequestParam(value="to") @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE)
                                                                             java.time.LocalDate to,
                                                                             @RequestParam(defaultValue="false")
                                                                             boolean detailed)
        Gets shifts within the specified range, in order to prevent too many shifts getting loaded at the same time
        Parameters:
        from - From date, as specified by LocalDate
        to - To date
        detailed - If you want detailed shifts or not
        Returns:
        Iterable of the shifts

      • addUserToShift

        @PostMapping(value="/{shift_id}/users")
 @Transactional
public void addUserToShift(@PathVariable
                                                                                     int shift_id,
                                                                                     @RequestParam
                                                                                     int user_id,
                                                                                     @RequestParam(defaultValue="true")
                                                                                     boolean available,
                                                                                     @RequestParam(defaultValue="false")
                                                                                     boolean responsible)
        Adds the specified user to the specified shift
        Parameters:
        shift_id - The shift
        user_id - The user
        available - Whether they are available or not
        responsible - Wherther they are going to be the responsible user for the shift or not

      • changeUserAssignment

        @PutMapping(value="/{shift_id}/users")
 @Transactional
public void changeUserAssignment(@PathVariable
                                                                                          int shift_id,
                                                                                          @RequestParam
                                                                                          int user_id,
                                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                          java.lang.Boolean available,
                                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                          java.lang.Boolean responsible,
                                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                          java.lang.Boolean assigned,
                                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                          java.lang.Boolean absent,
                                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                          java.lang.String comment)
        Changes a ShiftAssignment with the provided fields
        Parameters:
        shift_id - The shift
        user_id - The user
        available - Whether they are available for the shift or not
        responsible - Whether they are going to be the responsible user for the shift or not
        assigned - Whether they are going to be assigned to the shift or not
        absent - Whether they were absent from the shift or not
        comment - Comment for absence
